entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Emit ldlen in pattern matching on arrays #56199
  • AV from DirectMemoryAccessStreamReader #56195

PullRequests

Created

  • Support implicit conversions of lambda expressions to LambdaExpression #56200
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements
  • Fix await completion provider to handle non-"true" local function declarations #56196
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56193
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #56192
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56194
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #56191
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to features/MoveStaticMembers #56204
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #56203
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/inline_errors #56202
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main to features/list-patterns #56201
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix doubleclick for Value Tracking #56188
    Area-IDE, Feature - IDE Value Tracking
  • Don't try to rename references in source generated files #56189
    Area-IDE
  • Fix crashes in some nullable error scenarios #56190
    Area-Compilers
  • List patterns: subsumption checking #53891
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns, 17.0
  • Trigger refactoring if the cursor is put on single field or event syntax node #55523
    Area-IDE
  • More options refactoring #56089
    Area-IDE
  • Remove declaration-only-compilation from CompilationTracker #56139
    Area-IDE
  • Add ISymbol.MetadataToken #55913
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove the HasCompilation flag. #56132
    Area-IDE
